Board.name: target
Board.author: Bruno Coudoin (bruno.coudoin@gcompris.net)
Board.title: Practice addition with a target game
Board.description: Hit the target and count your points
Board.prerequisite: Can move the mouse, can read numbers and count up to 15 for the first level
Board.goal: Throw darts at a target and count your score.
Board.manual: Check the wind speed and direction, and then click on the target to launch a dart. When you all your darts are thrown, a window appears asking you to count your score. Enter the score with the keyboard then press the Enter key or the OK button.
